#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<string>
#include<cmath>

#include<algorithm>
#include<utility>
#include<vector>
#include<map>
#include<set>

#define pb push_back
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define sortv(a) sort(a.begin(),a.end())
#define rsortv(a) sort(a.rbegin(),a.rend())
#define eraseall(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))


using namespace std;

int main()
{
    
     int P,A;
	
	 scanf("%d",&P);
	
	 A=P/4;
	 
	 printf("%d\n",A*A);
	 
     return 0;
}
